incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in Colombia

incident_updates.body: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in Columbia, service was degraded for 14 minutes from 13:25 to 13:57 Pacific Time on Dec 26, 2024.  During this period of time customers may have experienced SMS Delivery Delays in Columbia. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Proxy API Causing 5XX Errors Across Various Programmable Voice Resources

incident_updates.body: Twilio Proxy API was degraded for 30 minutes between 10:51 pm – 11:21 pm Pacific Time on 12/13/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced 5XX Response Codes across various Programmable Voice resources. The issue has now been resolved.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to to Claro Network in Colombia. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Claro Network in Colombia. Our engineers continue working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: AccSec API Errors to the Netherlands

incident_updates.body: Twilio AccSec API was degraded for 30 minutes between 09:10 PST - 09:40 PST Pacific Time on 12/18/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced issues with our AccSec API in the Netherlands. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers have identified the issue with Twilio REST API and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: Twilio Voice was degraded for 15 minutes between 11:34 and 11:49 Pacific Time on 12/18/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced higher than normal packet loss that may have impacted some calls using the AU1 home region or Sydney edge, degraded audio quality or calls failing to connect. The issue has now been resolved.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue on Voice Conference. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
